column4: Anyone know an FTP command that'll let me GET everything in a directory?
okay stop the transfer and type prompt - this toggles that effect
why not give us a clue with a full name and path of this file
you are looking at library files - common resources that might just be used by the program
that will tell you where it lives on the machine before it calls to the /usr/lib/ajunta directory for resources that it wants
or you could just type /usr/bin/ajunta or because that path (/usr/bin/) is available to you typing ajunta should make it work
maybe having a look at this information on file system layout might be useful
read it and be at one with the file system
you could try - sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg
that will put you back to the starting point
System > Preferences > Removable Drives and Media
you can get Warty and install that
